Posts.Content: I found my lump a week ago and waiting for app at breast clinic. My sister was diagnosed with BC 5 years ago so i know i am slightly more at risk. How many people here have had sisters who have had BC
Posts.Title: how many people have had sisters who have also had BC

Posts.Content: Hi Rose So sorry to hear you now have a new cancer battle ahead. My older sister was diagnosed with BC 5 years ago at 45 she clear now. I am 47 and have found a lump so i know my risk is slightly higher. No other BC in the family though. Stay strong and i hope you can overcome this new cancer xx
Posts.Title: how many people have had sisters who have also had BC

Posts.Content: Hi Helen Thats a strong family history.
Posts.Title: how many people have had sisters who have also had BC

Posts.Content: As posted earlier this week i found a lump and went to GP who referred me to clinic as urgent. I called the clinic today to see when my app would be and was told there is an 8 - 10 week wait and thats an urgent app. So annoyed i have family history of BC but also how can they expect women to wait that long.
Posts.Title: 8 - 10 week for breast clinic appointment

Posts.Content: I asked on the phone is that urgent she said yes gp marked it urgent i said  what about being within 2 weeks she said sorry but thats the waiting time. I live in Rhondda cynon Taff south wales not impressed at all.
Posts.Title: 8 - 10 week for breast clinic appointment

Posts.Content: Hi Gay Yes i think Wales are not hitting the 2 week target but how on earth can they expect somone to wait that long. I looked into choose and book but only available in England. I cannot afford to go privately so guess ive got a long couple of months of waiting. I will call the helpline on Monday for advice though. Jess xx
Posts.Title: 8 - 10 week for breast clinic appointment
